title: B2 Looking for duo or 5's team! ADC/Jungle
body:
Hi all,

Im looking for a reliable support to lane with. Or a 5's team to join as an ADC or Jungler.

Still quite new to League and im still learning as I go. I have a mic, skype/teamspeak or can download your choice of VOIP and a positive attitude and a willingness to learn and grow as a player.

I have a limited champ pool, but it's getting bigger as I slowly build up what champs I have and can play.

Name: JJ
Age: 24
Role(s):ADC/Jungler (Looking to learn to support and top at some stage)
Top 3 Champs: Vayne, Kalista and Warwick.
Skype Name: XxbowjrxX

If your interested to take me on as a duo or on your team, you can contact me via Skype as posted above in my little bio or you can simply add me via the LoL client :)

Side Note: Would prefer you to be over 16, nothing personal, I just get a little weirded out by adding younger players :P

Hope to hear from you soon!

JJ/xSynx

replies.body: I will be able to go jungle warwick or vayne,Mf,Jinx adc add me if interested

I'm looking for players for my 5's team. We're Bronze 5 atm because we had a bunch of newbies, but now we're looking to get a bit more serious. We generally play around 6pm-12am NZ Time (3pm-9pm Aus Time ?). Will add you now and hopefully you can join us man. Your attitude seems great.

P.S. I'm also a support, so I can help you out duo too. Currently Silver 5 solo q.
